search_input:
The condition is exacerbated when the buildings windows are glazed in tinted glass. Light and colour God created the heavens and the Earth in the very beginningand God said Let there be light

*and the light was good; the darkness was not good. So God separated the light from the darkness. He called the light day and the darkness he called night. And there was evening, and there was morning—the first day.*
suggested_query: and the light was good; the darkness was not good. So God separated the light from the darkness. He called the light day and the darkness he called night. And there was evening, and there was morning—the first day.
